title: @Riot Can't Install Game
body:
So my game will not install and it keeps giving me the Error: Unspecified error occurred. Please Check the logs for more information.


WHAT IS THIS?!

replies.body: What % is the unspecified error happening?  This can help determine what is causing the issue.  Let me know!
There is currently an issue with the chat that may be the source of this issue. Check ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ) for updates on the issue.
